item.description: Is there a better way to spend an evening, then knitting and talking with fellow enthusiasts? We are a bunch of crazy knitters, ranging form novices to seasoned veterans. Bring what your working on or thinking about working on. Join us for some laughs as we share our knitting obsession. Although the conversation is not always knitting focused we always have a good time. We have a full social calendar with events in Dover, Portsmouth, Durham, and lots of road trips. All are welcome, including crocheters, spinners, and anyone else who loves to create things with yarn. There is a semi-annual membership fee of $5 which is well worth it.
item.name: The Seacoast Knitters
